title: Bonus Episode – Consent
description:
June 11, 2018 / Rabia and Colin investigate the question of whether people in police custody can consent to sexual acts.

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Patrick Cortes, and Chris Zabriskie.

This episode was sponsored by ZipRecruiter, ABC-The Last Defense, and Quip.

www.ZipRecruiter.com/undisclosed 

The Last Defense, an ABC original 7 episode docu-series, premieres Tuesday, June 12th at 10/9pm Central on ABC. 

www.GetQuip.com/undisclosed 

#undisclosed
